name: Khoj AI
title: khoj.dev
shortDescription: Khoj AI is designed to empower users to interact with documents more effectively using AI-driven tools. It serves as a research copilot, allowing users to ask questions, understand content, and generate new material seamlessly. Ideal for researchers and professionals who need to manage large volumes of information, Khoj AI can be customized to specific needs, making it adaptable for various industries such as healthcare, education, and more.
cons: May require initial setup and tuning
